response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value to both of us, with an estimated worth of $8,000 to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,500. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while taking advantage of the early bird discount. Don't miss out on this exceptional opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 7500}
